statements: SELECT * FROM maintenance_schedule;
SELECT equipment_name, last_maintenance_date FROM maintenance_schedule WHERE equipment_id = 1;
SELECT equipment_name, next_maintenance_date FROM maintenance_schedule WHERE equipment_name = 'Printer';
SELECT * FROM maintenance_schedule ORDER BY last_maintenance_date DESC;
SELECT equipment_id, equipment_name FROM maintenance_schedule WHERE next_maintenance_date >= '2022-10-01';
SELECT * FROM maintenance_schedule WHERE equipment_id = 1;
SELECT equipment_name, last_maintenance_date FROM maintenance_schedule WHERE next_maintenance_date < '2023-01-01';
SELECT * FROM maintenance_schedule ORDER BY last_maintenance_date DESC;
SELECT equipment_name, next_maintenance_date FROM maintenance_schedule WHERE equipment_id > 2 AND last_maintenance_date IS NOT NULL;
SELECT equipment_id, equipment_name FROM maintenance_schedule WHERE last_maintenance_date > '2022-06-01' AND next_maintenance_date < '2023-06-01';
SELECT * FROM mower_schedule WHERE id = 1;
SELECT name, last_maintenance_date FROM tractor_schedule;
SELECT id, name, next_maintenance_date FROM mower_schedule WHERE name LIKE 'Lawn%';
SELECT * FROM tractor_schedule WHERE last_maintenance_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT id, name, last_maintenance_date, next_maintenance_date FROM mower_schedule WHERE id IN (2, 3);
SELECT id, name, last_maintenance_date, next_maintenance_date FROM mower_schedule;
SELECT * FROM mower_schedule WHERE last_maintenance_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM mower_schedule WHERE next_maintenance_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT id, name FROM tractor_schedule ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT id, name, last_maintenance_date FROM tractor_schedule WHERE name LIKE 'John%';
SELECT * FROM equipment_maintenance_schedule;
SELECT equipment_name, next_maintenance_date FROM equipment_maintenance_schedule;
SELECT system_type, location FROM irrigation_system ORDER BY install_date DESC;
SELECT manufacturer, purchase_date FROM mower_details WHERE purchase_date > '2020-01-01';
SELECT * FROM equipment_maintenance_schedule WHERE last_maintenance_date < '2022-06-01';
SELECT * FROM equipment_maintenance_schedule WHERE equipment_id = 1;
SELECT equipment_name, last_maintenance_date FROM equipment_maintenance_schedule WHERE next_maintenance_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM mower_details WHERE purchase_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT system_type, location FROM irrigation_system WHERE install_date < '2021-06-01';
SELECT equipment_name, next_maintenance_date FROM equipment_maintenance_schedule WHERE next_maintenance_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2023-01-01';
SELECT * FROM mowers WHERE brand = 'John Deere';
SELECT model, brand, maintenance_date FROM tractors ORDER BY maintenance_date DESC;
SELECT serial_number FROM irrigation_systems WHERE brand = 'RainBird' AND maintenance_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT brand, model FROM tractors WHERE model LIKE '%XL%';
SELECT * FROM maintenance_schedule WHERE equipment_id = 1 AND maintenance_type = 'routine' ORDER BY schedule_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM mowers WHERE maintenance_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT brand, model, serial_number FROM tractors WHERE brand = 'John Deere';
SELECT brand, model, serial_number FROM irrigation_systems WHERE model LIKE '%Drip%';
SELECT * FROM maintenance_schedule WHERE equipment_id = 3 ORDER BY schedule_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT brand, maintenance_type, notes FROM maintenance_schedule WHERE maintenance_type = 'routine' AND notes IS NOT NULL ORDER BY equipment_id, schedule_date;
SELECT * FROM Mowers;
SELECT brand, model FROM Tractors WHERE brand = 'John Deere';
SELECT id, brand, model, last_maintenance_date FROM IrrigationSystems ORDER BY last_maintenance_date DESC;
SELECT id, maintenance_type, description FROM MaintenanceSchedules WHERE equipment_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM MaintenanceLogs WHERE log_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-28';
SELECT * FROM Mowers WHERE brand = 'Honda';
SELECT model, last_maintenance_date FROM Tractors ORDER BY last_maintenance_date DESC;
SELECT brand, model, last_maintenance_date FROM MaintenanceLogs JOIN MaintenanceSchedules ON MaintenanceLogs.maintenance_id = MaintenanceSchedules.id WHERE scheduled_date = '2022-08-15';
SELECT brand, model FROM IrrigationSystems WHERE brand LIKE '%Rain%';
SELECT * FROM Mowers UNION SELECT * FROM Tractors;
